name: A Gleam In My Eye
description:
On %his travels along winding paths, across rivers and past trees and thickets, your agent spots a shiny object from the corner of their eye.

A strange bird that somehow seems to glow vividly and with great colour.

choices.name: Lure The Bird
choices.description: Using their cunningness and patience, your agent lays out a trap in attempts to catch this strange bird

choices.name: Catch the Bird
choices.description:
Try to pounce on the bird and catch it by surprise

Only 40% chance of success

choices.name: Keep Travelling
choices.description: It's just a bird, nothing more
